snippet: Producers will track teams and leading players for a seven-hour series focusing on the Sochi Games and five outdoor stadium games during the league’s regular season.
abstract: NHL announces that it has hired producers to track teams and leading players for a seven-hour series focusing on the Sochi Games and five outdoor stadium games during the league’s regular season.
